comment_text: "7:35  worth noting IP68 and IP69 are separate standards. The 6 means total dust proof. The 8 indicates that it can survive water immersion greater than 1 metre  while a 9 indicates that it can survive high temperatures water pressure jets.

comment_id: So if a product is listed as IP69 and not IP68/IP69 then it is only been formally tested for pressure jets and not immersion."
